introduction: If there is a problem with food on the market the Food Standards Agency (FSA) will issue a food alert.  You can sign up to get alerts by email.
more_information: [Subscribe by text, email or RSS feed](http://www.food.gov.uk/enforcement/alerts/ "Sign up to FSA food alerts"){:rel="external"} on the FSA website.
overview: Emails from the Food Standard Agency about problems with food on the market
title: Sign up for food safety alerts
